sense.def:
Če ena stvar
corresponds with another
ali če dve stvari
correspond
, imata podoben namen, položaj ali status.

seg.quote: This view corresponds less and less with reality.
His job in Moscow corresponds to her position here.

sense.def:
Kadar dve številki ali količini
correspond
, sta enaki.

seg.quote: Check the telephone numbers in case they don't correspond.
The date of her birth corresponded with her father's visit.

sense.def:
Kadar dve osebi
correspond
, druga drugi pišeta pisma.
